name: Hidden Depths
description:
Hidden Depths is a fun little project we started during the My First Game Jam 2022.  During the course of prototyping and building the game we learned a lot. If you enjoy playing Hidden Depths we would love your feedback.

Core Team

Killstrike25 - Game Designer, Programmer, Art

Mahakali - Game Designer, Programmer, Art

Marcotte - Programmer

Lavalampjones - Sound Designer, Game Designer
